1000079425:
Fire a magic sphere followed by magical afterimages. The magic sphere explodes on contact, increasing the Light Attack of allies in range and reducing Light Resistance of the enemy hit. (Only 1 enemy can be hit.)

Enemy Light Resistance: -{2}%

Duration: {4} sec
1000079426: Summons a heavenly spear to drill into the ground in front of you, drawing in nearby enemies. Release the summoned spear to launch enemies. \n#yLight Magic\nMagic Damage: {0}% + {1}

1000079431:
Enhances #yVengeance from Above#w. Enemies from a wider range will be drawn towards the spear, and enemies will be launched higher than before. If a magic spear from #yPiercing Spike#w is nearby, the spear will explode immediately to deal greater damage to enemies.
